http://www.hard-core-dx.com/nordicdx/antenna/wire   here a link for a antenna   sight  for you this should help . i had a great one in till i did the caculations  and discovered that it would be 95feet by 35 feet  had to put that one on the back burner  i couldn't explain that  to the neighbors  about the box and all lol. also i grounded the minney box and  now we have more station than we know what to do with  , i used  a copper drain pipe under the sink lol i' belive that will use what they call a L  antenna   there a lot of info hope this will elp you 
joel
